meanings.sent1: I need to recleaning my room before my friends come over.
meanings.sent2: After the party, I will recleaning the dishes in the sink.
meanings.sent3: My cat decided to help with recleaning the spilled milk on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The rain recleaning the dusty car, leaving it sparkling clean.
meanings.sent5: Recleaning the windows made the whole room brighter and fresher.

meanings.sent1: Recleaning is necessary to maintain a tidy living space.
meanings.sent2: I hired a professional service for the recleaning of my carpets.
meanings.sent3: The recleaning of the playground was a community effort.
meanings.sent4: The recleaning of the office was scheduled for Friday afternoon.
meanings.sent5: Recleaning can be a tedious task, but the results are worth it.
